Text: Associate Analyst MidYear PRC Process Cc To all supervisors of Associates and Analysts The Associates and Analysts will be divided into final ranking meetings for the midyear PRC These meetings are scheduled as follows EES Associate Analyst Final Meeting June EBS Associate Analyst Final Meeting June EWSOthers Associate Analyst Final Meeting June EA Associate Analyst Final Meeting July EWSOthers includes Associates and Analysts from EWS EGM APACHI CALME CORP ECM EIM EIP ENW ESA ETS EOTT HPL PGE EWC Japan and EnronCredit The Associates and Analysts will be ranked within the following Peer Groups Analyst Analysts with up to one year of service hired between and Analyst Analysts with greater than one year of service hired prior to Associate All Associates hired prior to Associate and Analyst Ranking Process Analysts and Associates hired on or after will receive feedback only all others will receive both a PRC ranking and feedback Each Business Unit Supervisor will be responsible for providing a preranking to the PRC Rep The PRC Reps have access to the consolidated feedback for each assigned Associate and Analyst Please be sure that you have met with the assigned PRC Rep prior to the final Associate and Analyst meeting for your business unit Your business unit HR department may choose to set up preranking meetings check with your HR representative The final ranking for each Analyst an Associate will be determined through a cross calibration in each of the final meetings In these final meetings the Analysts and Associates will be represented by a PRC Rep from their Business Unit who should be familiar with their accomplishments Associate and Analyst PRC Reps Please refer to the attached spreadsheet for a list of Associates and Analysts who will be ranked in these meetings and their PRC Reps Contact me at extension if you have any additional questions Terry Bosien HR Manager Associate and Analyst Program

EWSOthers Associate and Analyst Midyear PRC SAVE THE DATE Cc Spst SAVE THE DATE The EWSOTHERS Associate and Analyst Midyear PRC will be held on June This meeting will include representation from EWS APACHI CALME CORP ECM EGM EIM EIP ENW ESA ETS EOTT HPL PGE EWC Japan EnronCredit and EWS Details to follow Terry Bosien HR Manager Associate and Analyst Program ext

EES Associate Analyst PRC Review tomorrow at am in EBM Cc Spst Please find attached a list of AAs to be ranked in tomorrows PRC meeting If you have not yet sent me a preranking on the individuals you will be representing please do so as soon as possible In preparation for tomorrow please print out and bring the consolidated feedback form for the employees that you will be representing A continental breakfast will be served and the meeting will start at am See you tomorrow Terry Bosien Human Resource Manager Associate Analyst Program

EES Associate and Analyst Midyear PRC SAVE THE DATE Cc Spst SAVE THE DATE The EES Associate and Analyst Midyear PRC will be held on June Details to follow Terry Bosien HR Manager Associate and Analyst Program ext

Li Sun Cc I just got a call from Li Sun She is expecting to get her H visa anytime and wants to make sure that she receives it Should we have her contact Tindall Foster directly Also by law when an individual on an Hb visa is terminated the company is required to provide them a one way ticket back to their home country Does that still apply in a bankruptcy If so who will be handling those arrangements Terry Bosien Human Resource Manager Associate Analyst Program

RE Letter to Rescind Offer Cc Michelle After getting your message regarding the waiver and discussing it with Hector McLoughlin Ive added some language to the original letter Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Tuesday November PM To Mayes Fran Bosien Teresa Cc Butcher Sharon Sullivan Kriste Palmer Lizzette Subject Letter to Rescind Offer Attached is a proposed letter to use when rescinding an offer of employment I have consolidated drafts done by Fran Mayes and Terry Bosien If you have other forms that you think work better please send them our way I think it will be useful to work from the same document across Enron Please note that each situation should be handled consistently with others in similar circumstances and that special care should be taken for those who have quit prior jobs relocated or are in precarious visa situations Michelle File mhcdoc

RE Letter to Rescind Offer Cc The AA program plans to give one months salary to the prospective program hires for November students who turned down other offers to accept ours There are only a couple we have not made any decision about the JanuaryFebruary hires yet Terry Original Message From Palmer Lizzette Sent Tue PM To Butcher Sharon Sullivan Kriste McLoughlin Hector Bosien Teresa Mayes Fran Cc Cash Michelle Subject RE Letter to Rescind Offer My understanding of our current position on this is to give one months pay to applicants who quit a job sold a home or relocated or have visa issues I suggest we confer on any request regarding paying anyone who doesnt fit the above If we do so we should be able to maintain some consistency Lizzette Original Message From Butcher Sharon Sent Tuesday November PM To Palmer Lizzette Sullivan Kriste McLoughlin Hector Bosien Teresa Mayes Fran Cc Cash Michelle Subject RE Letter to Rescind Offer Dear Lizzette Thats great news I trust that we will treat each person uniformly and consistently so as to minimize allegations of discriminatory treatment Thanks Sharon Original Message From Palmer Lizzette Sent Tuesday November PM To Butcher Sharon Sullivan Kriste McLoughlin Hector Bosien Teresa Mayes Fran Cc Cash Michelle Subject RE Letter to Rescind Offer I am generating a form waiver and release for use in cases in which we decide to pay an individual whose offer has been revoked Ill forward a draft to you shortly If you have other forms or suggestions please forward them to me Hopefully well all be able to be consistent and use just one form Lizzette

FW Letter to Rescind OfferMichelle What are your thoughts on this Terry Original Message From Bosien Teresa Sent Tuesday November PM To Cash Michelle Subject RE Letter to Rescind Offer Does ADEA even apply when it comes to rescinding an offer I thought it only applied to terminations Terry Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Tuesday November PM To Bosien Teresa Mayes Fran Cc Butcher Sharon Sullivan Kriste Palmer Lizzette McLoughlin Hector Subject RE Letter to Rescind Offer The minimum number of days should be and they should have days to revoke it Although the ADEA probably would not apply to AA candidates it could be an issue for the rest of the organization Michelle Original Message From Bosien Teresa Sent Tuesday November PM To Cash Michelle Mayes Fran Cc Butcher Sharon Sullivan Kriste Palmer Lizzette McLoughlin Hector Subject RE Letter to Rescind Offer Michelle After getting your message regarding the waiver and discussing it with Hector McLoughlin Ive added some language to the original letter File Rescind Offer Letter Nov doc Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Tuesday November PM To Mayes Fran Bosien Teresa Cc Butcher Sharon Sullivan Kriste Palmer Lizzette Subject Letter to Rescind Offer Attached is a proposed letter to use when rescinding an offer of employment I have consolidated drafts done by Fran Mayes and Terry Bosien If you have other forms that you think work better please send them our way I think it will be useful to work from the same document across Enron Please note that each situation should be handled consistently with others in similar circumstances and that special care should be taken for those who have quit prior jobs relocated or are in precarious visa situations Michelle File mhcdoc

FW Guaranteed BonusOriginal Message From Bosien Teresa Sent Wednesday November AM To Sweet Twanda Subject Guaranteed Bonus Here is the offer letter template the offer consists of an offer letter a term sheet and a summary of terms and conditions We assume that we would be obligated to pay the guaranteed minimum bonus even if the employee were laid off prior to February I know a lot of nonAAs get guaranteed minimum bonuses in their offer letters as well the Global Compensation database should have a comprehensive list Terry Bosien Human Resource Manager Associate Analyst Program
